name: Mastiff
description: A large, powerful breed of dog with a strong bite known for its loyalty and intelligence. Mastiffs are commonly used as guard and companion animals.
memorable: Mastiffs can knock down enemies with their bite and fiercely defend their masters.
goals: To protect, track, and assist in battle.
relations: Often found alongside soldiers, hunters, or as companions to humanoids.
environment: Domesticated settings, often in homes or at camps.
strengths: High agility and enhanced senses for tracking and detecting foes.
weaknesses: Low hit points and relatively low armor class make it vulnerable in combat.
attacks: Effective Bite attack that can knock targets prone.
most_powerful_ability: Keen Hearing and Smell provides advantage on perception checks.
senses: Heightened senses grant it a Perception score of 16 when using hearing or smell.
skills: Has a +3 bonus to Perception checks, making it adept at detecting threats.
additional_information: Can be trained as guard, hunting, or war dogs.
Able to react to protect allies during combat.
Often used by halflings and small humanoids as riding mounts.
Known for bravery and loyalty to those they trust.
Their agility aids them in evading attacks.

medium beast with keen senses and strong bite
agile hound trained for tracking and guarding
brave companion dog that defends its master
powerful beast that can knock enemies prone
